brandGuidelines.note: Review Google Brand Guidelines before use
brandGuidelines.guidelines: Do not distort, alter, or add effects to Google logos

alternativeCreation.description: Use simplified generic icons if brand usage is restricted
suggestions: Create abstract folder, spreadsheet, calendar, envelope icons
Use Flaticon or Noun Project for generic alternatives
